articles.title: Cricket World Cup - "As Of Now...": India Bowling Coach Almost Reveals Playing XI vs Bangladesh - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India vs Bangladesh, Cricket World Cup: The Rohit Sharma-led Indian cricket team has so far bundled out two heavyweight teams - Australia and Pakistan - under 200 in its first and third matches.
